SELECT i.id as itemId, i.item_name as itemName, i.sell_counts as sellCounts, ii.url as imgUrl, tempSpec.price_discount as price
From `foodie-shop-dev`.items i LEFT JOIN `foodie-shop-dev`.items_img ii ON i.id = ii.item_id LEFT JOIN (
SELECT item_id, MIN(price_discount) as price_discount FROM `foodie-shop-dev`.items_spec GROUP BY item_id ) tempSpec
ON i.id = tempSpec.item_id
WHERE ii.is_main = 1;
AND i.item_name like '%${paramsMap.keyWords}%'
order by
i.sell_counts desc
tempSpec.price_discount asc
i.item_name asc
